sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      records: [
        { id: 1, name: '记录1' },
        { id: 2, name: '记录2' },
        { id: 3, name: '记录3' }
      ],
      code: '',
      responseBlocks: [],  // Stores user input and generated test cases, images, or response text
      selectedOption: 'option1',  // Bound to the dropdown selector
      options: [
        { value: 'option1', label: '基本路径测试' },
        { value: 'option2', label: '路径覆盖测试' },
        { value: 'option3', label: 'GPT测试' }
      ]
    };
  },
  computed: {
    textareaWidth() {
      const minWidth = 300; // Minimum width in pixels
      const maxWidth = 600; // Maximum width in pixels
      const factor = 8; // Pixels per character (adjust as needed)
      const calculatedWidth = minWidth + this.code.length * factor;
      return `${Math.min(calculatedWidth, maxWidth)}px`;
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async submitCode() {
      if (this.code.trim() === '') return;  // Prevent submitting empty input

      // Save the current user input
      const currentCode = this.code;

      try {
        // Call the backend API to process the user input code
        const processResponse = await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/process_code', {  // Changed to port 5001
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
          },
          body: JSON.stringify({ code: this.code, option: this.selectedOption })  // Pass the selected option
        });

        if (processResponse.ok) {
          const result = await processResponse.json();

          // Construct a new response block including code, generated test cases, and flowchart path or response text
          const newBlock = {
            code: currentCode,
            flowchartPath: `http://127.0.0.1:5001${result.flowchartPath}`  // Ensure the path is correct
          };

          if (this.selectedOption === 'option1' || this.selectedOption === 'option2') {
            newBlock.testCases = result.testCases;
          } else if (this.selectedOption === 'option3') {
            newBlock.responseText = result.responseText;
          }

          // Add the new response block to responseBlocks
          this.responseBlocks.push(newBlock);

          // Clear the input textarea
          this.code = '';
        } else {
          const error = await processResponse.json();
          console.error('Error processing code:', error.error);
          alert(`Error: ${error.error}`);
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error submitting code:', error);
        alert('提交代码时发生错误，请检查控制台以获取详细信息。');
      }
    },
    formatInputs(inputs) {
      // Format inputs object as a string like "{'age': -346, 'b': -886}"
      return JSON.stringify(inputs, null, 2).replace(/"/g, "'");  // Preserve format and indentation
    }
  }
};
</script>
